SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SCVMM.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT !-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SCVMM.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_CONNECTION_DETAILS
! Log parameters specific to action : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "VM Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VMM_VMNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source VM Host" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VMM_VMHOST#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target VM Host" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VMM_DEST_VMHOST#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Destination Path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VMM_DEST_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Advanced Options" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VMM_ADV_OPTIONS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Move Options" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VMM_MOVE_OPTIONS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!-------------------------------------------Move VM------------------------------------------------------------ ! Target VM Host : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SCVMM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VMM_DEST_VMHOST# : SET &UC4RB_VMM_MOVEVM_CMD# = "Move-SCVirtualMachine -VMHost '&UC4RB_VMM_ESC_VALUE#' "
! Destination Path : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SCVMM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VMM_DEST_PATH# : SET &UC4RB_VMM_MOVEVM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VMM_MOVEVM_CMD#, " -Path '&UC4RB_VMM_ESC_VALUE#' ")
! Advanced options : IF &UC4RB_VMM_ADV_OPTIONS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_VMM_MOVEVM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VMM_MOVEVM_CMD#, " &UC4RB_VMM_ADV_OPTIONS# ") : ENDIF
! Restore Options : IF &UC4RB_VMM_MOVE_OPTIONS# <> "" : DEFINE &OPTIONS_ARRAY#, string, 2 : SET &OPTIONS_VARA# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_SCVMM.PRV.VARA.MOVE_VM_OPTIONS" : SET &CHECKBOX_OPTIONS# = &UC4RB_VMM_MOVE_OPTIONS# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SCVMM.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CHECKLIST_AS_ARG : SET &UC4RB_VMM_MOVEVM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VMM_MOVEVM_CMD#, &OPTIONS#) : ENDIF
!-------------------------------------Commandlet execution--------------------------------------------- try{ ! Connect to VMM Server : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SCVMM.PUB.INCLUDE.CONNECT_CMDLET
! Get VM : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SCVMM.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_VM_CMDLET
! Move VM command Write-Host "INFO: Executing Commandlet" Write-Host &UC4RB_VMM_MOVEVM_CMD# -VM $vm &UC4RB_VMM_MOVEVM_CMD# -VM $vm
}catch{ $errors=1 Write-Host "ERROR: $($error[0].Exception.Message)" }
!-----------------------------------Error Handling------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- !Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** Move VM ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** Move VM ACTION FAILED ********"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SCVMM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_ERRORSTATUS
